column5: There is an uplifting podcast I know that inspires people to personal transformation - it encourages you to cultivate your longest consistent relationship (the relationship with yourself) the way you would a close friend and begin treating yourself with kindness <3 People say that it makes their mind default to joyful thoughts about themselves rather than self depreciating; It's called "Joyful Headspace" and it's available on Spotify or your favorite listening platform <3 You may start feeling a little better if you're able to shift the focus in this way <3 So much love! - Marissa
